lines.text: GET OFF MY PLANE!

[as the President reaches Liberty Two Four]
Liberty Two Four is changing call signs - Liberty Two Four is now Air Force One!
Your national security advisor has just been executed. He's a very good negotiator. He bought you another half hour.
Peace isn't merely the absence of conflict, but the presence of justice.
I know what you're thinking, First Lady. You want me dead. Well, it might come to that. In the war, people die.
This isn't war! You just murdered an unarmed woman.
You, who murdered a 100,000 Iraqis to save a nickel on a gallon of gas. Are going to lecture me about the rules of war? Don't!
Blue Star... Air Force One is down!
Liberty 24 have you got the president?
[static]
Liberty DO YOU HAVE THE PRESIDENT!
Standby...
[President Marshal is grabbed off the line and taken on board]
[a watching crew member on his ear set]
... Liberty 24 is changing call sign, Liberty 24 is now Air Force One!
If this works, you get to be Postmaster General.
Sir, pull up! You've got one on your tail.
Get him off my tail!
Missile away. Air Force One. Break left and climb!
Sir, we've lost countermeasures.
This is Halo-2. They've lost countermeasures. I'm going in.
[takes the missile for Air Force One]
Give me the strap!
I trusted you with my life.
So will the next President. Now, give it to me.
Kathryn, if you give a mouse a cookie...
It's gonna want a glass of milk.

[after hearing the president]
My God! Is he saying what I think he's saying?
If we're going to act, we have to act now.
It's too risky.
The president is up there with a gun to his head.
He asking us to do that to Air Force One?
He's not asking. Your Commander-in-Chief has issued a direct order. Do it!
Okay guys give me some room. I've just been ordered to fire on Air Force One.
[Phillips is talking Marshall through dumping fuel with the avionics panel]
Hold on, just let me double-check, sir...
Oh, for Christ's sakes, man, hurry up!
Sir, if you get the wrong wire, you'll cut the engine feeds, and the plane will crash.
Then we don't want to get the wrong wire, do we?
Where are your chutes, guys?
We stay with the president.
Thank you.
I'm 12 years old, dad. In caveman days I'd be having children of my own.
That's what we call progress, young lady.
Did you hear my speech?
Yeah.
Yeah?
You're gonna get yourself re-elected.
That's what I keep telling them.
Today we are honoring this brave man. Ladies and gentlemen, my friend, the President of the United States of America.
IN RUSSIAN. The dead remember our indifference. The dead remember our silence.

I came here tonight to be congratulated, but today when I visited the Red Cross camps, overwhelmed by the flood of refugees fleeing from the horror of Kazakhstan, I realized I don't deserve to be congratulated. None of us do.
What's he doing?
That's not the speech.
your day is over. We will never negotiate. We will no longer tolerate, and we will no longer be afraid. It's your turn to be afraid.
When you talk to the President, you might remind him that I am holding his wife, his daughter, his chief of staff, his national security advisor, his classified papers - and his baseball glove!
[Crossing three wires blindly]
I'm counting on you, red, white and blue.
Mr. President, the Russian news crew is with us. I told them you'd give them a sound bite about life in the White House.
There *is* no life in the White House!
You've been very busy downstairs, haven't you? Killing my men?
[Slaps President Marshall's face after been tied with tape]
[Punches President Marshall's stomach]
[Lies down President Marshall against a desk and takes his gun and points it at his head]
NO!
You don't want to do that. I'm what you came for, don't forget that.
Then i'll kill them. Or just one, you pick. That's what you do in the White House? you play God.
You are a monster, and my father is a great man. You're nothing like my father!
[last lines]
Mr. President, welcome aboard, sir!
She couldn't stay your little girl forever Jim.
I know. But I was hoping she could wait until she was 14 or 15... or 50.
Your not here for this, you want something. What is it?
I want Radek.
How can I do that, I can't do that!
Then you die the three of you.
I'll do anything to save my family DON'T ASK ME FOR SOMETHING I CAN'T GIVE!
The most powerful man on the earth, and there certain things you cannot do. This is very curious, stop with your fuckin' LIES!
I would turn my back on God Himself for Mother Russia

[watching a football game]
Pass interference. That's cheating!
Only if they get caught.
Do you know who I am? I'm the President of the United States!
Don't think that means I don't shoot you!
These MiGs... how far away are they?
["Radar Lock" screen beeps]
Never mind
Nobody does this to the United States. The President will get his baseball glove back and play catch with this guy's balls!

[after seeing an enemy plane being blown up]
HAHAHA. The good guys are here.
[Ivan has just killed Melanie Mitchell]
I know what you're thinking First Lady,you want me dead. Well we may come to that. You see people do die in wars.
This isn't war! YOU JUST MURDERED AN UNARMED WOMAN!
[Ivan has just killed Jack Doherty]
Why did you kill him?
Because I believe.
We have the President.
How the hell did they get Air Force One?

[the Liberty 24 pararescue team only has time for one more retrieval]
Mr. President, it's time to get you off this plane!

The President is safe - but then you must know that. He ran from here like a whipped dog! I'm sure you can't wait for him to get back to making the decisions so you can stop... sweating... through that silk blouse of yours!
I understand that Air Force One can refuel in mid-air. Well we need fuel, and we need it now.
I'm sure we can come to some kind of arrangement. If you land the plane we'll trade fuel for hostages.
This is bullshit! It's simple physics. Without fuel the plan crashes,
[scoffs]
everybody dies!
We're trying to do everything we can.
Tell me what I want to hear or I will execute a member of the senior staff and continue killing one hostage every minute until the plane crashes, or refueling plane arrive. Well what do you say?
Fuel's on its way.
Thank you.

[to Ivan]
The Vice President in this case is like the Queen of England. You can't even buy airline tickets without talking to someone like me. Therfore, let me speak to The White House because I can assure you, I'm the one person who can make this all work out.
[first lines]

[after landing in Kazakstan]
Quick head count! One, two, three, four, five. Move out!
What are your intentions?
What arrogance... to think you could ever understand my intentions!
You can end this all with one phone call Mr. President!
I'M GETTING OFF THIS PLANE!
Go on, blyad!

[as Ivan and Andrei are trying to get into the cockpit and stop the plane from landing]
. No matter what happens, we land this aircraft is that understood?
